alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:28PM CDT until March 28 at 12:38AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Fenton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Steelville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.9 feet, Near this height, Missouri State Route O will be closed in both directions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Friday was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Steelville 12.0 13.5 14.6 8.8 5.7 4.4 3.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
